title: Bergen Harbour Hotel
subheading: Stay in the heart of Bergen
description:
A Boutique hotel - Our wish is to offer you a unique and more personal hotel experience. We want you to feel at home when you’re staying at our hotel – that means we go the extra mile to ensure your needs and wants are fulfilled. If you need anything, we stand ready to assist.

Within walking distance TO everything -We don’t use the term “in the heart of Bergen” lightly – we really mean it. From the Hotel in Finnegårdsgaten you’ll find all of the city’s sights and attractions just a couple of minutes away. The perfect place and location to explore the heart of Bergen

title: Zander K Hotel
subheading: Stay in the heart of Bergen
description:
Located next to Bergen Train Station, Zander K Hotel offers designer hotel accommodation in Bergen, 1.1 km from Bergen University. Guests can benefit from the fitness room, on-site wine bar and restaurant.

Each room includes a flat-screen TV. All rooms have a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

You will find free WiFi, a 24-hour front desk and indoor bicycle parking at the property. The hotel also offers free use of bicycles.

Hurtigruten Terminal Bergen is 1.5 km from Zander K Hotel, while Aquarium Bergen is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bergen , Flesland Airport, 16 km from the property.

title: Quality Hotel Edvard Grieg
subheading: Stay in the heart of Bergen
description:
Quality Hotel Edvard Grieg is a full service hotel only a 5 minute drive from Bergen Airport and 20 minutes to the city centre.

Close to local transport such as the tram (bybanen) and buses. Attractions, shopping, hiking, beaches, golf and activities such as climbingparks, trampolinepark and bowling are all within a few minutes driving from here.

The hotel has been recently renovated and expanded to become Western Norways largest conference hotel. The hotel offers free indoor and outdoors parking, restaurant with a la carte, bar with shuffleboard and a large fitness department.

title: Keyser Apartments 6
subheading: Stay in the heart of Bergen
description:
Set in Bergen, near Bergen University, University Museum of Bergen and Haakon's Hall, Keyser Apartments 6 features free WiFi. All units come with a living room, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fully equipped kitchen and a private bathroom with shower.

For added convenience, the property can provide towels and bed linen for an extra charge. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Bergen Maritime Museum, Grieg Hall and Bergen Art Museum.

The nearest airport is Bergen, Flesland Airport, 17 km from Keyser Apartments 6.

title: Annehelenes B&B
subheading: Stay in the heart of Bergen
description:
Annehelene's B&B offers a small, but nice room adjoining private entrance and bathroom in a new part of an old wooden house at Nordnes. The house is from 1864 and neatly restored to meet the comfort demands of our days.

We have however put love and effort into keeping its original soul and atmosphere. The neighbourhood is well known for its charming old wooden houses side by side in narrow cobble streets with small gardens.

title: ANA's Bed & Breakfast
subheading: Close to Badeplass Beach and room with Mountain View
description:
Our newly renovated home is secluded on the mountain side, just half an hour walk from the city center.

From the bedroom window you will have a complete overview of the Valley of Bergen and can admire both Mt. Floien and Mt. Ulriken.

With public transport (departing every 20 minutes, just outside the door) you can easily get to Bergen Airport Flesland (BGO) and Bergen Railway Station, as well as all the city and fjord region has to offer of exciting nature and cultural experiences.

title: Barfot Apartments
subheading: One of our bestsellers in Bergen!
description:
Situated in Bergen, near Møhlenpris Badeplass Beach, Bergen University and University Museum of Bergen, Barfot Apartments features free WiFi.

Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and a fridge, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa.

There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and a hairdryer. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Hurtigruten Terminal Bergen, Rosenkrantz Tower and St. John's Church.

The nearest airport is Bergen Airport, Flesland Airport, 12 km from Barfot Apartments.

title: Clarion Hotel Havnekontoret
subheading: Stay in the heart of Bergen
description:
This fashionable hotel is housed in a Neoclassical 1920s stone building, in the historic Bryggen area of Bergen.

It offers a free evening meal and harbour views from the rooftop. All rooms at Hotel Havnekontoret have a flat-screen TV and safety deposit box. Some rooms include views of Vågen Bay, while others overlook the hotel garden.

Clarion Collection Hotel Havnekontoret offers 24-hour tea/coffee, afternoon pancakes or waffles and a light evening meal for free. Guests can relax in the hotel’s library-lounge or sauna.

Other facilities include a gym and a free internet computer in the lobby.
